name: Tajemnica Bursztynowej Komnaty
overview: Tajemnica Bursztynowej Komnaty or The secret of the Amber Room is an adventure game with graphics presented in the form of photographs. The action takes place in the surrounding countryside of the old palace. The main goal of the player is finding the famous Amber Chamber. The character may carry up to eighteen items that can be used and combined. The game screen is divided into inventory/action panel, commentary field and photograph showing the current location.
